mng: a moment ago, just now, (indicating sth happening later than expected), (preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until, (followed by a numerical clause) only

exm.mng: just recently, just a moment ago, just now

exm.cur: 患难之交才是真正的朋友
exm.trd: 患難之交纔是真正的朋友
exm.mng: a friend in need is a friend indeed (English proverb), cf idiom 患難之交|患难之交, a friend in need
exm.pyn: huàn nàn zhī jiāo cái shì zhēn zhèng de péng you
